long_description: Ready for a long day hike or minimalist overnight, the men's Deuter Futura Pro 36 Pack features a sleeping bag compartment, rain cover-and a free Deuter visor while supplies last. Aircomfort Flexlite Pro system supplies fantastic back ventilation, flexibility and a comfortable, floating hipbelt. Spring steel frame with 2 stays effectively transfers load weight to your hips. Anatomically shaped 3D AirMesh shoulder straps have load adjusters. Pull-forward closure allows the hipbelt to be easily tightened while on the move. 2 zippered hipbelt pockets for valuables, camera or snacks. 7 exterior pockets, including 1 in the lid, zippered front, side bellows, etc. Internal valuables pocket; water-resistant wet laundry pocket. Attachment for ice axe and walking poles; side compression straps. Hydration system compatible (sold separately), including a reflective attachment for drinking tube. Separate bottom compartment for sleeping bag; SOS label inside the lid. Deuter Futura Pro 36 Pack for men comes with a removable rain cover.
short_description: Ready for a long day hike or minimalist overnight, the men's Deuter Futura Pro 36 Pack features a sleeping bag compartment, rain cover-and a free Deuter visor while supplies last.
